channel.title: BART Real Time ETA Feed
channel.description: Real time estimated arrivals for Bay Area Rapid Transit. Use subject to terms at http://www.bart.gov/dev/schedules/license.htm
channel.copyright: Copyright (C) 2010 San Francisco Bay Area Rapid Transit District. All rights reserved.
